p09/motor/exp.01
the acceleration
tango://p09/motor/exp.01
the motor starts to move with this rate, then accelerates
the conversion factor, steps = conversion*units
set to 1, when the calibration is defined
set to 1, when the user calibration is defined
set to 1, when the conversion is defined
used by completeMove to wait after a motor comes to rest
the motor speed
the maximum slew rate
the minumum slew rate
backlash is used for movements which have NOT (steps > 0 && StepBacklash) > 0 || (steps < 0 && StepsBacklash) < 0
see the description of unitCalibration
this value may be changed by the user, it is an offset to stepCalibration, see the explanations at unitCalibration
corresponds to the upper unit limit, changing on affects the other
corresponds to unit limit min, changing one affects the other
the internal (Software) position
the controller (Software) position
this value corresponds to stepBacklash, changing one changes the other, see the explanations given for stepBacklash
the calibration point is specified by a unit position and the corresponding step position, the formular for units2steps is then:
steps = stepsCalibration + conversion*( unit - unitCalibration)
this value may be changed by the user, an offset to the unitCalibration, see the explanation there
the upper motor limit
the lower limit of a motor
Protection mask
1 if the conversion factor of the encoder was defined
1 if the encoder home position was defined
1 if the encoder went through a homing procedure
the encoder conversion factor
the unit position of the encoder home switch
if 1, the server returns the encoder position when asked for the motor position
closed loop stepping mode on/off
the maximum slew used in closed loop corrections
dead band in encoder counts (steps * encConv/Conv)
[1,32000], SlewCorr = CorrGain*PositionError (but < SlewRateCorrection)
slit tolerance, in encoder units, [0,65535]
0 - cutOrMap parameter is ignored 1 - is Cut 2 - is Map
Cut: the motor is not moved over the cut, pos in [cut, cut+360[ automatic re-calibration, target positions are mapped into [cut, cut+360[ Map: positions is kept in [map, map+360[, positions are automatically re-calibrated, automatically short way
the value of the cut/mapping point, for explanations see flagCutOrMap
the output of the ER? command
A debugging tool. This array contains records about the recent write operations to the server.

field.name: DataLength
field.doc: Length of the data spectrum to be read from memory

field.name: BankId
field.doc: Selects bank 0 or 1 from the MCA memory
